name: Red River
description:
This is a very early demo of the game.

It has no in-game tutorial so ill just explain it here.

The Aim is to survive 2 aims of enemies by killing them and keeping yourself alive.

There is no win or lose screen sorry.

Mouse0- Attack

Mouse1- Block

Depending on the position of your mouse the attack/block direction will change.

Burnout:

The spikes on your character indicate your burn meter, the brighter the spike the closer you are to burning out. When in burnout the spikes are white.

Health:

The brighter the health cross on your back the lower hp you have.

Shield Bash:

Press Q to shield bash. If the enemy is holding their attack (dim indicator) then if you shield bash them you stun them momentarily.

Dodge:

Simple dodge roll, press LShift to use.

Deployment:

Left Click on a squad to select it, Right click to place it, left click to select it again.

Once deployed in the manner you want click the button on the top left , its a bit misplaced :)
